mapper.select: SELECT heart.heart_num as heartNum, heart.member_num as memberNum , heart.club_num as clubNum , heart.club_name as clubName, club.club_thumb_pic as clubThumbPic, club.club_startdate as clubStartDate, club.club_enddate as clubEndDate, club.club_leader as clubLeader, club.club_freq as clubFreq FROM heart , club WHERE club.club_num = heart.club_num AND heart.member_num = #{memberNum} AND club.club_fee = 0;

SELECT heart.heart_num as heartNum, heart.member_num as memberNum , heart.club_num as clubNum , heart.club_name as clubName, club.club_thumb_pic as clubThumbPic, club.club_startdate as clubStartDate, club.club_enddate as clubEndDate, club.club_leader as clubLeader, club.club_freq as clubFreq FROM heart , club WHERE club.club_num = heart.club_num AND heart.member_num = #{memberNum} AND club.club_fee > 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT into heart (member_num, club_num, club_name) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{clubNum}, #{clubName})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM heart WHERE club_num = #{clubNum} AND member_num=#{memberNum};
